content: This basic PR introduces a PartialOrder instance for ZFC sets.

I have an open PR which defines a preorder on docs#PSet and a partial order on docs#ZFSet. I was told that I could get the latter by defining a SetLike ZFSet instance instead. However, I've seen a lot of movement and discussion about SetLike and the docs#SetLike.instPartialOrder instance, so I'm not sure if that's the correct thing to do anymore.
(Note that I have other major PRs like #17027 and #19985 that depend on this, so I'd like some sort of conclusion sooner rather than later)
